Summary: Stayed in one spot until I smoked my cig then moved.
divs: Sighting Detailsfirst I went outside to smoke I looed up and seen what I thougt was a star. I looked again then it started to move slow no sound and it did not blink it was just a white light until I seen your show I thought I was just crazy I have not seen anything since then yours ricky
trends: There has been one other sighting in Martinsville
There were no other sightings in Martinsville on or around September 17th 1995
